verbs.description: [ARG0: White House counselor Kellyanne Conway] [V: said] [ARG1: President Trump would earn a Noble Peace Prize for his work with North Korea - unlike President Obama who was ' handed ' the prestigious award] .
White House counselor Kellyanne Conway said President Trump [V: would] earn a Noble Peace Prize for his work with North Korea - unlike President Obama who was ' handed ' the prestigious award .

White House counselor Kellyanne Conway said [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: earn] [ARG1: a Noble Peace Prize for his work with North Korea] - [ARGM-ADV: unlike President Obama who was ' handed ' the prestigious award] .
White House counselor Kellyanne Conway said President Trump would earn a Noble Peace Prize for his work with North Korea - unlike President Obama who [V: was] ' handed ' the prestigious award .

White House counselor Kellyanne Conway said President Trump would earn a Noble Peace Prize for his work with North Korea - unlike [ARG2: President Obama] [R-ARG2: who] was ' [V: handed] ' [ARG1: the prestigious award] .
